unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels on Indian Roads!**
normalised: auto buzz new wheels on indian roads

unnormalised: Hey folks, gearheads and petrolheads! The Indian auto market is heating up faster than a tandoor in Delhi summer. We've got a whole bunch of new vehicles launching, from shiny new bikes to family-sized SUVs.
normalised: hey folks, gearheads and petrolheads! the indian auto market is heating up faster than a tandoor in delhi summer. we have got a whole bunch of new vehicles launching, from shiny new bikes to family sized S U Vs.

unnormalised: First up, Dr. Iyer from ARAI just gave the thumbs up to the "Bajrangi Bullet 2.0," a souped-up version of our beloved Enfield. Expect it to hit showrooms near you soon.
normalised: first up, doctor iyer from A R A I just gave the thumbs up to the bajrangi bullet two point zero, a souped up version of our beloved enfield. expect it to hit showrooms near you soon.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors is teasing us with the "Nexon Electric Max Pro," promising a whopping 450 km range on a single charge! Perfect for those weekend trips to Lonavala, right?
normalised: then, tata motors is teasing us with the nexon electric max pro, promising a whopping four hundred and fifty kilometer range on a single charge! perfect for those weekend trips to lonavala, right?

unnormalised: And speaking of SUVs, Mahindra just unveiled the "Scorpio N Adventure Edition" with all the bells and whistles, including a rooftop tent! Imagine camping under the stars in Rajasthan...
normalised: and speaking of S U Vs, mahindra just unveiled the scorpio N adventure edition with all the bells and whistles, including a rooftop tent! imagine camping under the stars in rajasthan

unnormalised: Finally, Maruti Suzuki launched a new budget hatchback, priced starting from Rs. 4.5 lakhs. Perfect for navigating those crazy Mumbai streets! This one boasts a surprisingly spacious cabin, even with just 600 sq ft of parking space at home. Stay tuned for our full reviews!
normalised: finally, maruti suzuki launched a new budget hatchback, priced starting from rupee four point five lakhs. perfect for navigating those crazy mumbai streets! this one boasts a surprisingly spacious cabin, even with just six hundred square feet of parking space at home. stay tuned for our full reviews!
